page.title: 12Interview with Mr.Fisher.
page.content: Mr.Fisher is the milkman in Mattishall.He gets his milk supplies from Norwich,and his milk-round is to nine hundred houses in two villages, Mattishall and Welborne.He delivers one thousand,five hundred pints of milk per day. Apart from milk he also sells fruit juice,soft drinks,butter, eggs and cream.He used to compete with three other milkmen delivering in these two villages,but now he does it on his own. Mr.Fisher was born in Mattishall and has lived here for almost fifty years.He has seen many changes,chiefly the influx of people from outside this immediate area and the resulting huge increase in housing and appearance of modern estates. Also,the building of the new Middle School and Health Centre have been major developments.
